languages.text: "Резня. Врагов, или друг друга — неважно. Они страдают от того же, что пережил я — в реальном мире их сводит с ума глас Сай'ланштреш, заглушить который способен только свист клинков и стоны умирающих".

traits.locale_text: "Изничтожение. Падение кабала — особенно такого, как Опустошительная буря — ведет к пиршеству стервятников. Противники не успокоятся, пока последний из моих воителей не испустит дух... или не склонится перед чужой волей".

languages.text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."
languages.original_text: "Резня. Врагов, или друг друга — неважно. Они страдают от того же, что пережил я — в реальном мире их сводит с ума глас Сай'ланштреш, заглушить который способен только свист клинков и стоны умирающих".

traits.locale_text: "Carnage. It matters not who is mangling who. They are suffering from the same ailment that I had, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh that in the realspace can only be drowned out by the whistling of the blades and the moans of the dying."

"Carnage. It matters not who is mangling who. They are suffering from the same ailment that I had, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh that in the realspace can only be drowned out by the whistling of the blades and the moans of the dying."

"Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

"Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

"Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

languages.text: "Ein Blutbad. Feinde töten oder einander, das ist gleichgültig. Sie leiden, wie ich gelitten habe, in den Wahnsinn getrieben von der Stimme von Sai'lanthresh. Im Realraum lässt sie sich nur durch das Pfeifen von Klingen und das Stöhnen der Sterbenden übertönen."
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Blutbad. Feinde töten oder einander, das ist gleichgültig. Sie leiden, wie ich gelitten habe, in den Wahnsinn getrieben von der Stimme von Sai'lanthresh. Im Realraum lässt sie sich nur durch das Pfeifen von Klingen und das Stöhnen der Sterbenden übertönen."

languages.text: “是屠杀。杀死敌人，或者自相残杀，这并不重要。他们承受着和我一样的痛苦，被赛·兰斯雷什的声音逼疯了。在真实世界中，只有利刃的呼啸声和垂死之人的呻吟声，才能掩盖她的声音。”
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: “是屠杀。杀死敌人，或者自相残杀，这并不重要。他们承受着和我一样的痛苦，被赛·兰斯雷什的声音逼疯了。在真实世界中，只有利刃的呼啸声和垂死之人的呻吟声，才能掩盖她的声音。”

languages.text: « Un carnage. Ils déciment leurs ennemis ou se massacrent les uns les autres... peu importe. Ils souffrent comme j'ai souffert, rendus fous par la voix de Sai'lanthresh. Dans l'espace réel, seuls les sifflements des lames et les gémissements des mourants peuvent noyer son appel. »
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: « Un carnage. Ils déciment leurs ennemis ou se massacrent les uns les autres... peu importe. Ils souffrent comme j'ai souffert, rendus fous par la voix de Sai'lanthresh. Dans l'espace réel, seuls les sifflements des lames et les gémissements des mourants peuvent noyer son appel. »

languages.text: «La masacre. Matar a enemigos o matarse entre ellos, eso no importa. Sufren como yo he sufrido, enloquecidos por la voz de Sai'lanthresh. En el espacio real, lo único capaz de acallarla es el silbido de las espadas y los gemidos de los moribundos».
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: «La masacre. Matar a enemigos o matarse entre ellos, eso no importa. Sufren como yo he sufrido, enloquecidos por la voz de Sai'lanthresh. En el espacio real, lo único capaz de acallarla es el silbido de las espadas y los gemidos de los moribundos».

languages.text: 「大虐殺だ。敵を殺し、敵でない者を殺し…もうどうでもいいんだ。奴らは俺が苦しんできたのと同じぐらい苦しんでいる、セランスレッシュの声で気が狂ってな。リアルスペースでは剣が切り裂く音と死に際のうめき声だけがそいつを引き寄せることができる」
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: 「大虐殺だ。敵を殺し、敵でない者を殺し…もうどうでもいいんだ。奴らは俺が苦しんできたのと同じぐらい苦しんでいる、セランスレッシュの声で気が狂ってな。リアルスペースでは剣が切り裂く音と死に際のうめき声だけがそいつを引き寄せることができる」

languages.text: "Katliam. Düşman öldürmek veya birbirini öldürmek, önemi yok. Onlar da benim çektiklerimi çekti, Sai'lanthresh'in sesi nedeniyle delirdiler. Gerçekuzayda bu sesi bastırmanın tek yolu kılıçların fısıltısı ve ölenlerin iniltileridir."
languages.original_text: "Carnage. Killing enemies, or each other — it does not matter. They suffer as I have suffered, driven insane by the voice of Sai'lanthresh. In realspace it can only be drowned out by the whistling of blades and the moans of the dying."

traits.locale_text: "Katliam. Düşman öldürmek veya birbirini öldürmek, önemi yok. Onlar da benim çektiklerimi çekti, Sai'lanthresh'in sesi nedeniyle delirdiler. Gerçekuzayda bu sesi bastırmanın tek yolu kılıçların fısıltısı ve ölenlerin iniltileridir."
